title: Email painted over
content: I received an email, Thunderbird on my Windows 11 PC, that was heavily covered by an unknown solid black design. Most of the text was covered over. I was unable to remove the blockage. When I opened the same email on both my iPhone and my Yahoo mail account, there was no problem - no blockage. It looked somewhat like a large black mask laid over the text.
creator: amammini

title: Sound for Incoming Mail
content: Not a huge problem, but VERY FRUSTRATING! After years of reliable performance, my personalized incoming mail notification sound (wav format) suddenly stopped playing. The 'test' function in settings works fine, but NOTHING happens when actually downloading messages. I've tried EVERY possible FIX, but NO LUCK. Any suggestions? Thanks
creator: drushbo
